title: Mordekaiser
body:
hey guys, i've been playing {{champion:82}} a lot lately and im having a blast. i like him better in bot lane but it eems a bit harder to play that way. idk if its jst my build/playstyle or if he just doesnt work in a duo lane anymore. 

can someone tell me how im supposed to build and play him in bot lane? i usualy go for tank hybrid builds. i get rylais  triforce and than full tank

and if hes not viable d u think riot will try to keep him in bot or they will rework him as solo/jg?

replies.body:
Riot rightfully nerfed Mordekaiser bot, he is back to being a solo laner or even a Jungler.


Mordekaiser bot was a mistake, and it is a good thing they realised that.

I play him as a botlaner.  Wouldn't mind bouncing thoughts and ideas off you sometime if you would like.  

Playstyle is a big thing when I play him botlane.  Being mindful of your position and knowing when to let minions die to avoid unfavorable trades is by far the largest hurdle I've had to work with.  Aside from that I'd say knowing exactly what your support can provide to you is the second most important thing to learn as you go.
Don't play him bot. But if you do, play in a premade and have your buddy pick Leona or Blitz.
well nowadays i like to team him up with a support that can 2v1 s likezyra for example and i just push lane til 6, get drake than turret plus double kil bot

He's a solo laner nowadays since most current bot lane picks give him a hard time.

He used to work back before the Marksman rework and only because he was overtuned with unfair gimmicks.
Nowadays he's back to being a solid top laner and even a good jungler if you invest some time into learning him.

Bot lane only works if you got a coordinated team that plays into your strengths, the chances of that happening is below zero.

I cant help you play him botlane but if you insist get a duo support partner. You need engage from your support leona thresh blitz alistair.   Your success hinges on your support not with anything you are actually doing.  


My personal opinion:  please dont play him bot that idea needs to die so we can get a reworked champion not a failed experiment

S1 Morde Main hoping for an ACTUAL rework.

Glad you like him try him top/ jungle
